alert.note: Alert for Attala; Holmes (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 12 at 9:44PM CDT until March 18 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Big Black River Near Bovina affecting Warren and Hinds Counties. Big Black River At West affecting Holmes and Attala Counties. Big Black River Near Bentonia affecting Madison and Yazoo Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Black River At West. * WHEN...Until late Thursday night. * IMPACTS...At 19.0 feet, Thousands of acres of agricultural land are under water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM CST Saturday the stage was 19.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:45 PM CST Saturday was 19.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to crest at 19.2 feet just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Big Black River West 15.0 19.1 Sat 7 pm CST 18.9 18.3 17.3 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Sunday afternoon at 1245 PM CDT.
